hwAccessCommonMIB.name: hwAccessCommonMIB

revisions.description: V1.06, -Modify the leaf nodes name of hwOpticsDdmInfoExRxPowerLow,hwXponOntDdmInfoExRxPowerLow to hwOpticsDdmInfoExRxPower,hwXponOntDdmInfoExRxPower -Modify the postfix name of all the leaf nodes in the table hwOpticsDdmInfoExTable and hwXponDeviceOntDdmInfoExTable from HighAlarm,LowAlarm,HighWarning,LowWarning to HighAlarmThreshold,LowAlarmThreshold,HighWarningThreshold,LowWarningThreshold -Add the leaf nodes hwOpticsDdmInfoExCatvRxPowerLowAlarmThreshold,hwOpticsDdmInfoExCatvRxPowerHighAlarmThreshold,hwOpticsDdmInfoExModuleType, hwOpticsDdmInfoExSubType,hwOpticsDdmInfoExPrecision,hwOpticsDdmInfoExEncapsulationType,hwOpticsDdmInfoExVendorPN,hwOpticsDdmInfoExUsedType in table hwOpticsDdmInfoExTable. -Add the leaf nodes hwXponOntDdmInfoExCatvRxPowerLowAlarmThreshold,hwXponOntDdmInfoExCatvRxPowerHighAlarmThreshold,hwXponOntDdmInfoExModuleType, hwXponOntDdmInfoExSubType,hwXponOntDdmInfoExPrecision,hwXponOntDdmInfoExEncapsulationType,hwXponOntDdmInfoExVendorPN,hwXponOntDdmInfoExUsedType in table hwXponDeviceOntDdmInfoExTable.

V1.05, Add a leaf hwOpticsDdmInfo10GTxBiasCurrent to HwOpticsDdmInfoExEntry Add a leaf hwOpticsDdmInfo10GTxPower to HwOpticsDdmInfoExEntry Add a leaf hwXponOntDdmInfoExOltRxOntPower to HwXponDeviceOntDdmInfoExEntry.

V1.04, modify the node name of hwProtTypeAdaptFaultAlarmTrap to hwPortTypeAdaptFaultAlarmTrap modify the node name of hwProtTypeAdaptFaultRestoreAlarmTrap to hwPortTypeAdaptFaultRestoreAlarmTrap modify the node name of hwProtTypeAdaptSucessAlarmTrap to hwPortTypeAdaptSuccessAlarmTrap.
V1.03, modify the description of the whole MIB file.
V1.02, modify the description of the temperature. modify the node name of hwXponOntDdmInfoExTable to hwXponDeviceOntDdmInfoExEntry for clearing the compilation warning.

V1.01, add the definition of the trap node,include: hwProtTypeAdaptFaultAlarmTrap hwProtTypeAdaptFaultRestoreAlarmTrap hwProtTypeAdaptSucessAlarmTrap hwXponnniPortSwitchAlarmTrap hwXponnniPortSwitchTrap

hwAccessCommonMIB.contactinfo: Huawei Industrial Base Bantian, Longgang Shenzhen 518129 People's Republic of China Website: http://www.huawei.com Email: support@huawei.com
hwAccessCommonMIB.description: The MIB is used for defining Huawei's ACCESS management common MIB objects.

hwOpticsDdmInfoExTable.name: hwOpticsDdmInfoExTable
hwOpticsDdmInfoExTable.description: Table hwOpticsDdmInfoExTable supports the query of the information about the optical transceiver. The index of this table is ifIndex.

hwOpticsDdmInfoExEntry.name: hwOpticsDdmInfoExEntry
hwOpticsDdmInfoExEntry.description: Table hwOpticsDdmInfoExTable supports the query of the information about the optical transceiver. The index of this entry is ifIndex.

hwOpticsDdmInfoExTemperature.name: hwOpticsDdmInfoExTemperature
hwOpticsDdmInfoExTemperature.description: Temperature of the optical transceiver. Unit: 0.000001 C(centigrade) Options: 1. invalid(0x7FFFFFFF) - Indicates that the query fails or no information is detected

hwOpticsDdmInfoExTemperatureHighAlarmThr.name: hwOpticsDdmInfoExTemperatureHighAlarmThreshold
hwOpticsDdmInfoExTemperatureHighAlarmThr.description: Upper alarm threshold of the temperature. Unit: 0.000001 C(centigrade) Options: 1. invalid(0x7FFFFFFF) - Indicates that the query fails or no information is detected

hwOpticsDdmInfoExModuleType.description: Options: 1. gpon(1) - GPON 2. epon(2) - EPON 3. epon10g(3) - 10G EPON 4. gpon10g(4) - 10G GPON 5. wdmpon(5) - WDM PON 6. hybridpon(6) - hybrid PON 7. gponepon(7) - GPON/EPON 8. unknown(8) - Unknown 9. invalid(-1) - Indicates that the query fails or no information is detected

hwOpticsDdmInfoExUsedType.name: hwOpticsDdmInfoExUsedType
hwOpticsDdmInfoExUsedType.description: This object indicates the application scenario of the optical transceiver. Options: 1. olt(1) - OLT 2. onu(3) - ONU 3. catvtriplex(4) - CATV TriPlex 4. unknown(5) - Unknown 5. invalid(-1) - Indicates that the query fails or no information is detected

hwXponDeviceOntDdmInfoExTable.name: hwXponDeviceOntDdmInfoExTable
hwXponDeviceOntDdmInfoExTable.description: Table hwXponDeviceOntDdmInfoExTable supports the query of the information about the optical transceiver of the ONT port. The index of this table is a combination of ifIndex and hwXponOntDdmInfoExOntIndex.

hwPortHostmode.description: The port host mode. Options: 1. geMode(7) - Ge mode 2. adaptMode(27) - Adapt mode 3. gponMode(114) - Gpon mode 4. eponMode(115) - Epon mode

hwPortActualmode.name: hwPortActualmode
hwPortActualmode.description: The port actual mode. Options: 1. geMode(7) - Ge mode 2. adaptMode(27) - Adapt mode 3. gponMode(114) - Gpon mode 4. eponMode(115) - Epon mode

hwPortTypeAdaptFaultAlarmTrap.name: hwPortTypeAdaptFaultAlarmTrap
hwPortTypeAdaptFaultAlarmTrap.description: Port type adaptation fault alarm trap. This trap message is generated when the uplink port on the ONU is set to work in adaptive mode, the type of the OLT downlink port transmitting the optical signal is different from the type of the uplink port on the ONU. As a result, the uplink port on the ONU is faulty.

hwPortTypeAdaptFaultRestoreAlarmTrap.name: hwPortTypeAdaptFaultRestoreAlarmTrap
hwPortTypeAdaptFaultRestoreAlarmTrap.description: Port type adaptation fault recovery alarm trap. This trap message is generated when the uplink port on the ONU is set to work in adaptive mode, the type of the OLT downlink port transmitting the optical signal is the same as the type of the uplink port on the ONU, and the service on the uplink port is restored.

hwPortTypeAdaptSuccessAlarmTrap.name: hwPortTypeAdaptSuccessAlarmTrap
hwPortTypeAdaptSuccessAlarmTrap.description: Port type adaptation success alarm trap. This trap message is generated when the type of the OLT downlink port transmitting the optical signal changes, the adaptation of the uplink port on the ONU is successful.

hwXponnniPortSwitchAlarmTrap.name: hwXponnniPortSwitchAlarmTrap
hwXponnniPortSwitchAlarmTrap.description: Protection switchover occurs on the PON port and it has no effect on the service. The first hwPortIndex is the source port index, the second hwPortIndex is the destination port index.

hwXponnniPortSwitchTrap.name: hwXponnniPortSwitchTrap
hwXponnniPortSwitchTrap.description: TypeC or TypeD port switch trap. The first ifIndex is the active one after switching over. The second ifIndex is the standby one after switching over.
